Detailed Description

seDRMText wraps the DRM <Text> class.

Warren Macchi

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMText::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_TEXT
